Component: Sim origin is the location/orientation of the skeletal mesh component.
Actor: Sim origin is the location/orientation of the actor containing the skeletal mesh component.
World: Sim origin is the world origin. Teleporting characters is not recommended in this mode.
RootRelative: Sim origin is the location/orientation of the root bone.
BoneRelative: Sim origin is the location/orientation of the bone specified in RelativeSpaceBone
